marketcapitalization.label: Market Capitalization
marketcapitalization.description: Market capitalization in the crypto market is the total value of a cryptocurrency.

volume.label: Volume
volume.description: volume is the total amount of a cryptocurrency traded over a specific period, usually 24 hours, indicating market activity and liquidity

return_field.label: Return
return_field.description: Return measures the gain or loss on an investment over time, indicating profitability.

marketcapdominance.label: Market Cap Dominance
marketcapdominance.description: Market cap dominance measures a specific cryptocurrency's market share relative to the total market capitalization of all cryptocurrencies.

fifty_two_week_high.label: 52 Week High
fifty_two_week_high.description: 52-week high is the highest price a cryptocurrency has reached over the past one year and comparing to the current price, indicating peak performance. This metric helps assess the price trend and potential resistance levels.

fifty_two_week_low.label: 52 Week Low
fifty_two_week_low.description: 52-week low is the lowest price at which a cryptocurrency has traded over the past one year and comparing to the current price, indicating its weakest performance during that period. This metric helps assess the price trend and potential support levels.

one_month_high.label: 1 Month High
one_month_high.description: 1 Month High is the highest price a cryptocurrency has reached over the past one month and comparing to the current price, indicating peak performance. This metric helps assess the price trend and potential resistance levels.

one_month_low.label: 1 Month Low
one_month_low.description: 1 Month Low is the lowset price a cryptocurrency has reached over the past one month and comparing to the current price, indicating weakest performance. This metric helps assess the price trend and potential support levels.

two_thousand_seventeen_to_date.label: 2017 to Date
two_thousand_seventeen_to_date.description: '2017 to Date' refers to the cumulative return of a price from the year 2017 up to the current date.

mtd.label: MTD (Month to Date)
mtd.description: 'Month to Date (MTD)' refers to the return from the beginning of the current month up to the present date.

ytd.label: YTD (Year to Date)
ytd.description: 'Year to Date (YTD)' refers to the return from the beginning of the current year up to the present date.

rsi_value.label: RSI Value
rsi_value.description: It is a momentum oscillator that measures the speed and change of price movements of an asset. The RSI provides a numerical value that ranges from 0 to 100, helping traders and investors identify potential overbought and oversold conditions in the market.

one_year.label: 1 Year
one_year.description: The 1-Year return is calculated based on the performance of a coin over last one year

ma9_ma20_value.label: MA9 Above MA20
ma9_ma20_value.description: Indicates whether the 9-day moving average (MA9) is currently above the 20-day moving average (MA20), 'Yes' indicating a upward trend, 'No'  indicating a downward trend

ma20_ma50_value.label: MA20 Above MA50
ma20_ma50_value.description: Indicates whether the 20-day moving average (MA20) is currently above the 50-day moving average (MA50), 'Yes' indicating a upward trend, 'No'  indicating a downward trend

ma50_ma200_value.label: MA50 Above MA200
ma50_ma200_value.description: Indicates whether the 50-day moving average (MA50) is currently above the 200-day moving average (MA200), 'Yes' indicating a upward trend, 'No'  indicating a downward trend

macd_value.label: MACD Value
macd_value.description: MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence) value measures the difference between MACD Line and Signal Line, indicating strength of the ongoing trend.

atr_value.label: ATR Value
atr_value.description: Average True Range (ATR) measures volatility by averaging the true ranges over a specific period ATR=Average of True Ranges over the period (14 days)

adx_value.label: ADX Value
adx_value.description: ADX (Average Directional Index) is a technical indicator that measures the strength of a trend, without specifying the trend direction, over a 14-days period

moving_average_rating.label: Moving Average Rating
moving_average_rating.description: Moving Average Rating (MAR) involves analyzing multiple moving averages to assess a cryptocurrency's trend strength and direction.

momentum_rating.label: Momentum Rating
momentum_rating.description: Momentum Rating measures the speed of price changes, indicating trend strength. A high positive value indicates strong upward momentum, while a high negative value shows strong downward momentum.

trend_rating.label: Trend Rating
trend_rating.description: Trend Rating in the crypto market assesses the strength and direction of a price trend

twenty_ma.label: 20 MA
twenty_ma.description: The 20-day Moving Average (20 MA) in crypto calculates the average closing price over the past 20 days and comparing to the current price

fifty_ma.label: 50 MA
fifty_ma.description: The 50-day Moving Average (50 MA) in crypto calculates the average closing price over the past 50 days and comparing to the current price

hundred_ma.label: 100 MA
hundred_ma.description: The 100-day Moving Average (100 MA) in crypto calculates the average closing price over the past 100 days and comparing to the current price

two_hundred_ma.label: 200 MA
two_hundred_ma.description: The 200-day Moving Average (200 MA) in crypto calculates the average closing price over the past 200 days and comparing to the current price

beta_1y.label: Beta
beta_1y.description: Beta measures a cryptocurrency's volatility relative to the overall market, with a beta greater than 1 indicating higher volatility.

business_risk_volatility.label: Business Risk Volatility
business_risk_volatility.description: Level of business risk of a coin and the related volatility in the price of the coin. (1 is less volatile coin and 5 is highly volatile coin)

business_risk_inflation.label: Business Risk Inflation
business_risk_inflation.description: A measure of growing risks for a coin in terms of regulatory, financial, technological and market changes. (1 is low inflation in business risk and 5 is high inflation)

engagement.label: Engagement
engagement.description: A comprehensive parameter detailing the overall user engagement of a coin by using various quantitative and qualitative data points. (1 is less engagement. 5 is most user engagement)

revenue_scale.label: Revenue Scale
revenue_scale.description: A metric of current revenue level of a company in comparison to major market players. (1 is low revenue scale and 5 is high revenue scale)

revenue_growth.label: Revenue Growth
revenue_growth.description: A relative measure of the growth in revenue of a coin with respect to major market players. (1 is low growth in revenue and 5 is great growth in revenue)

fees.label: Fees
fees.description: A relative measure of total fees earned by the coin in comparison to other coins. (1 is low fees earned and 5 is high fees earned by the coin)

vc_funding.label: VC Funding
vc_funding.description: Scale of funding received by a coin from investors. (1 is low overall funding received and 5 is highly funded coin)

team.label: Team
team.description: Work experience of the founding team members and their previous accomplishments. (1 is less accomplished and low previous experience and 5 is a highly experienced team in crypto space)
